channel.description: Recent content in Projects on l1x/dev

item.title: Elafi
item.description: Elixir Ads Filter (ελάφι) https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/ελάφι#Greek Apps dnsauth: authoritative nameserver, for lan dnscache: dns proxy and recursive resolver shades: blacklist/whitelist webui: settings & monitoring Motivation Fighting ads supposed to be more accessible. I really like Pihole but it has more dependencies that I am comfortable with (dnsmasq, lighttpd, php, Bootstrap 3.x, etc.). Dependecies I try to not to use any dependecies. Esqlite is a NIF based library. It might be worth to start up as a separate application.
